class.name: LBFGSSolver
class.brief_description: The LBFGSSolver class provides an implementation of the L-BFGS optimization algorithm.
class.description: L-BFGS (Limited-memory Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno) is a popular choice for parameter estimation in machine learning. It's an optimization algorithm in the family of quasi-Newton methods that approximates the BFGS algorithm using a limited amount of computer memory. It is robust but slower with a time complexity of O(N^2), where N is the number of variables.
